1{-# LANGUAGE PatternSynonyms #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Token utilities.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Token.Utility
7  ( -- * Selectors
8    tokenContent, untoken,
9    tokenDetailTypeString,
10    tokenParents,
11  
12    -- * Type of token
13    isBlankToken, sweepToken,
14    isShortToken, isTermToken,
15    isOpenToken, isCloseToken,
16    isOpenTokenOf, isCloseTokenOf,
17    isUnknownToken,
18  ) where
19
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture            as O
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                as B
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Token.Token  as S
23
24
25-- ----------------------  Selector
26
27-- | Get the content of token.
28--
29--   >>> let tok = S.TTermPath B.def ["r", "x"] in tokenContent tok
30--   "/r/x"
31
32tokenContent :: S.Token -> String
33tokenContent tok =
34    case tok of
35      S.TText     _ _ s    -> s
36      S.TShort    _ a b    -> a ++ "." ++ b
37      S.TTermN    _ _ n    -> '/' : n
38      S.TTerm     _ _ ns   -> concatMap ('/' :) ns
39      S.TLocal    _ n _ _  -> S.unlocal n
40      S.TSlot     _ _ s    -> s
41      S.TOpen     _ s      -> s
42      S.TClose    _ s      -> s
43      S.TSpace    _ n      -> replicate n ' '
44      S.TComment  _ s      -> s
45      S.TName     _ op     -> B.name op
46      S.TUnknown  _ s _    -> s
47
48untoken :: S.Token -> String
49untoken = dispatch where
50    dispatch tok =
51        case tok of
52          S.TText     _ q s    -> text q s
53          S.TShort    _ a b    -> a ++ "." ++ b
54          S.TTermN    _ _ n    -> '/' : n
55          S.TTerm     _ _ ns   -> concatMap ('/' :) ns
56          S.TLocal    _ n _ _  -> S.unlocal n
57          S.TSlot     _ _ s    -> s
58          S.TOpen     _ s      -> s
59          S.TClose    _ s      -> s
60          S.TSpace    _ n      -> replicate n ' '
61          S.TComment  _ s      -> s
62          S.TName     _ op     -> B.name op
63          S.TUnknown  _ s _    -> s
64    text q s =
65        case q of
66          S.TextUnk            -> s
67          S.TextRaw            -> s
68          S.TextQ              -> "'" ++ s
69          S.TextQQ             -> "\"" ++ s ++ "\""
70          S.TextKey            -> s
71          S.TextBar            -> s
72          S.TextLicense        -> s
73
74-- | Get detail type string of token.
75--
76--   >>> let tok = S.textToken "flower" in (S.subtypeName tok, tokenDetailTypeString tok)
77--   ("text", Just "raw")
78
79tokenDetailTypeString :: S.Token -> Maybe String
80tokenDetailTypeString tok =
81    case tok of
82      S.TText     _ f _    -> Just $ S.subtypeName f
83      S.TShort    _ _ _    -> Nothing
84      S.TTermN    _ _ _    -> Nothing
85      S.TTerm     _ _ _    -> Nothing
86      S.TLocal    _ _ _ _  -> Nothing
87      S.TSlot     _ n _    -> Just $ slotTypeText n
88      S.TOpen     _ _      -> Nothing
89      S.TClose    _ _      -> Nothing
90      S.TSpace    _ _      -> Nothing
91      S.TComment  _ _      -> Nothing
92      S.TName     _ b      -> Just $ S.subtypeName b
93      S.TUnknown  _ _ _    -> Nothing
94
95slotTypeText :: Int -> String
96slotTypeText 0   = "positional"
97slotTypeText 1   = "named"
98slotTypeText 2   = "global"
99slotTypeText _   = "unknown"
100
101tokenParents :: S.Token -> [S.Token]
102tokenParents (S.TLocal _ _ _ ps) = ps
103tokenParents _                   = []
104
105
106-- ----------------------  Predicate
107
108-- | Test token is blank, i.e., comment or space.
109isBlankToken :: O.Test S.Token
110isBlankToken (S.TSpace _ _)       = True
111isBlankToken (S.TComment _ _)     = True
112isBlankToken _                    = False
113
114-- | Remove blank tokens.
115sweepToken :: O.Map [S.Token]
116sweepToken = B.omit isBlankToken
117
118-- | Test token is unknown.
119isUnknownToken :: O.Test S.Token
120isUnknownToken (S.TUnknown _ _ _) = True
121isUnknownToken _                  = False
122
123-- | Test token is short-type token.
124isShortToken :: O.Test S.Token
125isShortToken (S.TShort _ _ _)     = True
126isShortToken _                    = False
127
128-- | Test token is term-type token.
129isTermToken :: O.Test S.Token
130isTermToken (S.TTermN _ _ _)      = True
131isTermToken (S.TTerm _ _ _)       = True
132isTermToken _                     = False
133
134-- | Test token is open-type token.
135isOpenToken :: O.Test S.Token
136isOpenToken (S.TOpen _ _)         = True
137isOpenToken _                     = False
138
139-- | Test token is close-type token.
140isCloseToken :: O.Test S.Token
141isCloseToken (S.TClose _ _)       = True
142isCloseToken _                    = False
143
144-- | Test token is a open-type of the specific bracket.
145--
146--   >>> let tok = S.TOpen B.def "(" in isOpenTokenOf "(" tok
147--   True
148--
149--   >>> let tok = S.TOpen B.def "{" in isOpenTokenOf "(" tok
150--   False
151
152isOpenTokenOf :: String -> O.Test S.Token
153isOpenTokenOf p1 (S.TOpen _ p2)   = p1 == p2
154isOpenTokenOf _ _                 = False
155
156-- | Test token is a close-type of the specific bracket.
157isCloseTokenOf :: String -> O.Test S.Token
158isCloseTokenOf p1 (S.TClose _ p2) = p1 == p2
159isCloseTokenOf _ _                = False
160
